subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for the ScrollView UI component.

subMembers.name: pulledDownText
subMembers.description: Specifies the text shown in the pullDown panel when pulling the content down lowers the refresh threshold.

subMembers.name: pullingDownText
subMembers.description: Specifies the text shown in the pullDown panel while pulling the content down to the refresh threshold.

subMembers.name: reachBottomText
subMembers.description: Specifies the text shown in the pullDown panel displayed when content is scrolled to the bottom.

subMembers.name: refreshingText
subMembers.description: Specifies the text shown in the pullDown panel displayed when the content is being refreshed.

properties.name: dxScrollView
properties.description: The ScrollView is a UI component that enables a user to scroll its content.

Methods.name: refresh()
Methods.description: Locks the UI component until the **release(preventScrollBottom)** method is called and executes the function passed to the [onPullDown] property and the handler assigned to the [pullDown] event.

Methods.name: release(preventScrollBottom)
Methods.description: Notifies the ScrollView that data loading is finished.

Methods.name: toggleLoading(showOrHide)
Methods.description: Toggles the UI component's loading state.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onPullDown
Events.description: A function that is executed when the "pull to refresh" gesture is performed. Supported on mobile devices only.

Events.name: onReachBottom
Events.description: A function that is executed when the content is scrolled down to the bottom.

Events.name: onScroll
Events.description: A function that is executed on each scroll gesture.

Events.name: onUpdated
Events.description: A function that is executed each time the UI component is updated.

Events.name: pullDown
Events.description: Raised when the "pull to refresh" gesture is performed.

Events.name: reachBottom
Events.description: Raised when the content is scrolled down to the bottom.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: PullDownEvent
Types.description: The type of the [pullDown] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ReachBottomEvent
Types.description: The type of the [reachBottom] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ScrollEvent
Types.description: The type of the [scroll] event handler's argument.

Types.name: UpdatedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [updated] event handler's argument.
